migrations.description: Set project names in project.json files
migrations.name: 15.1.0-set-project-names

migrations.description: Removes es2015Polyfills option since legacy browsers are no longer supported.
migrations.name: remove-es2015-polyfills-option

migrations.description: Creates or updates webpack.config.js file with the new options for webpack.
migrations.name: webpack-config-setup

migrations.description: Add the babelUpwardRootMode option to the build executor options.
migrations.name: add-babelUpwardRootMode-flag

migrations.description: Update jest configs to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-configs-jest-29

migrations.description: Update jest test files to support jest 29 changes (https://jestjs.io/docs/upgrading-to-jest29)
migrations.name: update-tests-jest-29

migrations.description: Add node_modules to root eslint ignore
migrations.name: add-eslint-ignore

migrations.description: Remove browserslist config as it's handled by build-angular
migrations.name: remove-browserlist-config

migrations.description: Remove exported `@angular/platform-server` `renderModule` method. The `renderModule` method is now exported by the Angular CLI.
migrations.name: update-platform-server-exports

migrations.description: Remove no longer needed require calls in Karma builder main file.
migrations.name: update-karma-main-file

migrations.description: Install the required angular-devkit packages as we do not directly depend on them anymore
migrations.name: install-required-packages

migrations.description: Split global configuration files (e.g., workspace.json) into individual project.json files.
migrations.name: 15-7-0-split-configuration-into-project-json-files
